title: T206 Chick Gandil Sovereign back for sale RAW ungraded poor
author: Michael McGuffin

posts.post_title: T206 Chick Gandil Sovereign back for sale RAW ungraded poor
posts.post_content:
Hi to all, I am new to the forum and happened to pick up a graded Chick Gandil T206 card and am trying to sell my old one.  The one I have is a RAW ungraded fair to poor condition card with a sovereign back.  I am asking 80.00 including shipping for it.  If anybody is interested please contact me through the forum or at [url]michael.mcguffin@hotmail.com[/url] paypal welcome.  Send me your email if you would like a picture.

Thank You,
Michael

Michael,

Welcome to the board.  You might want to add if it's a Sov460 (I think that the only sovereign for that card and it's quite a bit rarer than the other types).

Best wishes,
Scott

posts.post_title: Re: T206 Chick Gandil Sovereign back for sale RAW ungraded poor
posts.post_content: Front and back scans would also be helpful.

[quote name="scottglevy" post=1222725]Michael,

Welcome to the board.  You might want to add if it's a Sov460 (I think that the only sovereign for that card and it's quite a bit rarer than the other types).

Best wishes,
Scott[/QUOTE]


Welcome aboard Michael.

Hi Scott

Pardon me for making this point....SOVEREIGN 460 Gandil is not that "rare". This T206 subject is in the group of 460-only series guys that I refer to as the "Exclusive 12".
These 12 guys had to be multi-printed with respect to the other subjects in the 460-only series, as they are more available with SOVEREIGN (and other tougher) backs.

Check-out my thread on this subject............[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=163949[/url]



[IMG]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh622/tedzan77/crandevdufforgangeyRHx25_zps09099928.jpg[/IMG]

.[IMG]http://i1255.photobucket.com/albums/hh622/tedzan77/HumMcGPfeSheTanWheRHx25a_zpse49b9174.jpg[/IMG]



Scott....wishing you and your Dad, Hank, a very Happy New Year,


TED Z
